name: Tech Talk - AI Innovations
description: A tech talk focusing on the latest innovations in Artificial Intelligence and its impact on various industries.

name: Hackathon 2025
description: A 24-hour coding competition where participants solve real-world problems and showcase their programming skills.

name: DJ Night - Grooves
description: A fun-filled night with music, dance, and good vibes hosted by top DJs from the city.

name: Football Tournament
description: A competitive football tournament among various departments with knockout rounds.

name: Basketball Championship
description: A departmental basketball championship featuring teams from various colleges and departments.

name: Open Mic Night
description: An open mic night where students can showcase their singing, poetry, and comedy skills.

name: Workshop on Cybersecurity
description: A hands-on workshop on the basics of cybersecurity, ethical hacking, and data protection.

name: Inter-College Cricket Tournament
description: An exciting cricket tournament between various college teams, with a trophy for the winner.

name: Science Quiz
description: A science quiz competition with various rounds covering different fields of science and technology.

name: Hackathon for Social Good
description: A hackathon event where participants work on projects that aim to address real-world social problems.

name: Digital Marketing Workshop
description: A workshop covering the fundamentals of digital marketing, including SEO, content marketing, and social media strategy.
